男性不育家庭患癌症的风险升高在最近的一项研究中，犹他大学亨茨曼癌症研究所的研究人员发现，男性不育家庭存在一个令人惊讶的趋势：患某些癌症的风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Cancer-risk-elevated-in-families-with-male-infertility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Cancer-risk-elevated-in-families-with-male-infertility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0601f4b4-2ed4-46d8-bd3c-86700c7493fc Tue, 09 Apr 2024 13:41:13 -0400 Cancer risk elevated in families with male infertility

研究表明童年孤独与首发精神病之间存在关联一项新研究表明，12 岁之前感到孤独超过 6 个月的儿童比没有感到孤独的儿童更容易出现精神病发作，其中女性比男性更容易患精神病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Study-shows-association- Between-childhood-loneiness-and-first-episode-psychosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Study-shows-association- Between-childhood-loneiness-and-first-episode-psychosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eef19705-be0a-4a9d-927e-82239a420563 Tue, 09 Apr 2024 07:02:41 -0400 Study shows association between childhood loneliness and first-episode psychosis
电休克疗法被发现对某些精神疾病是安全有效的治疗方法研究人员发现，电休克疗法（ECT），即电流通过大脑，可以减轻精神疾病的严重程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Electroconvul​​sive-Therapy-found-to-be-afe-and- effective-treatment-for-some-mental-illnesses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Electroconvul​​sive-Therapy-found-to-be-afe-and- effective-treatment-for-some-mental-illnesses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e2732e1-73af-4978-b390-3eadf01c09b6 Tue, 09 Apr 2024 07:01:00 -0400 Electroconvulsive Therapy found to be safe and effective treatment for some mental illnesses
由于农村医疗保健获取持续存在漏洞，城乡死亡率差距扩大马修·罗奇 (Matthew Roach) 在亚利桑那州卫生服务部担任人口动态统计经理的两年里，以及在其流行病学项目工作的十年前，他亲眼目睹了令农村卫生专家感到担忧的死亡率趋势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/City-country-mortality-gap-widens-amid-persistent-holes-in-rural-health-care-access.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/City-country-mortality-gap-widens-amid-persistent-holes-in-rural-health-care-access.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a32353cf-8540-40b7-a3ac-70ba1680e284 Tue, 09 Apr 2024 06:52:15 -0400 City-country mortality gap widens amid persistent holes in rural health care access
